desc: Woods Group Marine and Aviation Ltd is a family run company based in Devon specialising in Asset Management, Salvage and Recovery. The company is run by Colin and Stephen Wood who have over 50 years of experience in the industry. Over recent years we have concentrated more on the Aviation and Marine industry.

layout.text: Welcome to Woods Group (Marine & Aviation) Ltd

Welcome to our online store of Marine & Aviation stock.
We have a big range of items with a huge warehouse packed with stock. So if you cannot locate anything in our store please contact us and we maybe able to help you further.
Due to the nature of our items Postal prices vary so once you have the items you need please let us know and we can give you a combined postage price.
We also post outside the UK but please get in contact for a postal price.
